definition: to divide/to separate/to distribute/to allocate/to distinguish (good and bad)/part or subdivision/fraction/one tenth (of certain units)/unit of length equivalent to 0.33 cm/minute (unit of time)/minute (angular measurement unit)/a point (in sports or games)/0.01 yuan (unit of money)

sentences.english: First, an analyst creates a description of the business process including a diagram.
sentences.chinese: 首先，一个分析员创建了一个包括图的业务过程描述。

sentences.english: When a research firm begins coverage on a particular stock or sector.
sentences.chinese: 证券行或研究分析员发表对一种股票的首次研究分析。

sentences.english: Some analysts feel this is almost inevitable.
sentences.chinese: 一些分析员觉得这几乎是必然的。

sentences.english: TEs are product experts, quality advisers and analyzers of risk.
sentences.chinese: TE是产品专家，质量顾问也是风险分析员。

sentences.english: BPMN serves the analysts in drawing analysis diagrams, but it's not executable.
sentences.chinese: BPMN适合分析员做分析图，但不能执行。

sentences.english: Indeed, most analysts think that the deleveraging still has far to go.
sentences.chinese: 确实，绝大多数分析员认为减债还有很长的路要走。

sentences.english: After reanalysis, analysts removed all but 14 columns.
sentences.chinese: 经过重新分析，分析员保留了14个字段。

sentences.english: Analysts said Beijing was holding Cheung up as a signal to the public to show it was serious about cracking down on government graft.
sentences.chinese: 分析员表示中国政府藉成克杰一案显示政府严打贪污。

sentences.english: That's certainly true of the CIA analyst played by John Malkovich.
sentences.chinese: 约翰马尔科维奇扮演的中情局分析员就是这样的。

sentences.english: The credulous investors believed in every word the analysts said.
sentences.chinese: 轻信别人的投资者完全相信分析员所说的一切。

definition: the Stars and Stripes (US flag)/by extension, the United States of America/abbr. for Citibank 花旗銀行|花旗银行
Bloomberg (name)/Michael Bloomberg (1942-), US billionaire businessman, politician and philanthropist

pinyin: ruan3 jian4 kai1 fa1 ren2 yuan2
